com.mobilecoin.lib

Class AccountSnapshot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mobilecoin.lib.AccountSnapshot

  • public class AccountSnapshot
extends Object
    This class represents the Account's state at the specified block index

      • getReceiptStatus

        @NonNull
public Receipt.Status getReceiptStatus(@NonNull
                                                Receipt receipt)
                                         throws InvalidReceiptException
        Check the status of the transaction receipt. Recipient's key is required to decode verification data, hence only the recipient of the transaction can verify receipts. Sender should use MobileCoinClient.getTransactionStatus(com.mobilecoin.lib.Transaction)
        Parameters:
        receipt - provided by the transaction sender to the recipient
        Returns:
        Receipt.Status
        Throws:
        InvalidReceiptException

      • getTransactionStatus

        @NonNull
public Transaction.Status getTransactionStatus(@NonNull
                                                        Transaction transaction)
                                                 throws NetworkException
        Check the status of the transaction. Sender's key is required to decode verification data, hence only the sender of the transaction can verify it's status. Recipients should use getReceiptStatus(com.mobilecoin.lib.Receipt) )}
        Parameters:
        transaction - obtained from MobileCoinClient.prepareTransaction(com.mobilecoin.lib.PublicAddress, java.math.BigInteger, java.math.BigInteger)
        Returns:
        Transaction.Status
        Throws:
        NetworkException

      • getTransferableAmount

        @NonNull
public BigInteger getTransferableAmount()
        Calculate the total transferable amount excluding all the required fees for such transfer

      • estimateTotalFee

        @NonNull
public BigInteger estimateTotalFee(@NonNull
                                            BigInteger amount,
                                            @NonNull
                                            MobileCoinClient.FeeLevel feeLevel)
                                     throws InsufficientFundsException
        The minimum fee required to send a transaction with the specified amount. The account balance consists of multiple coins, if there are no big enough coins to successfully send the transaction FragmentedAccountException will be thrown. The account needs to be defragmented in order to send the specified amount. See MobileCoinClient.defragmentAccount(java.math.BigInteger, com.mobilecoin.lib.DefragmentationDelegate)
        Parameters:
        amount - an amount value in picoMob
        Throws:
        InsufficientFundsException

      • estimateTotalFee

        @NonNull
public BigInteger estimateTotalFee(@NonNull
                                            BigInteger amount)
                                     throws InsufficientFundsException
        The minimum fee required to send a transaction with the specified amount. The account balance consists of multiple coins, if there are no big enough coins to successfully send the transaction FragmentedAccountException will be thrown. The account needs to be defragmented in order to send the specified amount. See MobileCoinClient.defragmentAccount(java.math.BigInteger, com.mobilecoin.lib.DefragmentationDelegate)
        Parameters:
        amount - an amount value in picoMob
        Throws:
        InsufficientFundsException

      • prepareTransaction

        @NonNull
public PendingTransaction prepareTransaction(@NonNull
                                                      PublicAddress recipient,
                                                      @NonNull
                                                      BigInteger amount,
                                                      @NonNull
                                                      BigInteger fee)
                                               throws InsufficientFundsException,
                                                      FragmentedAccountException,
                                                      FeeRejectedException,
                                                      InvalidFogResponse,
                                                      AttestationException,
                                                      NetworkException,
                                                      TransactionBuilderException,
                                                      FogReportException
        Parameters:
        recipient - PublicAddress of the recipient
        amount - transaction amount
        fee - transaction fee (see MobileCoinClient.estimateTotalFee(java.math.BigInteger, com.mobilecoin.lib.MobileCoinClient.FeeLevel))
        Returns:
        PendingTransaction which encapsulates the Transaction and Receipt objects
        Throws:
        InsufficientFundsException
        FragmentedAccountException
        FeeRejectedException
        InvalidFogResponse
        AttestationException
        NetworkException
        TransactionBuilderException
        FogReportException
